ai-anya-e0802n3:218_0: gets rid of repelled for the donort of (living) company, he spoke (only).
ai-anya-e0802n3:219_0: Dependently in attachments are the errands of wealth; I am mastered in the seven times.
ai-anya-e0802n3:220_0: in the upper place where the faults will go.
ai-anya-e0802n3:220_1: The five (people) brahmins converted to Brahmā’s retinue (of the Faith) in the Awakened One).
ai-anya-e0802n3:221_0: regarding the third group of ninety-nine brothers, for the third time,
ai-anya-e0802n3:222_0: which is in factable for the third division of food and the seventh day.
ai-anya-e0802n3:223_0: you’re mastered by knowledge, self-controlled, or tail, to the Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha,.
ai-anya-e0802n3:224_0: Thus there is a sixth sticking in the Kaṭimaka,
ai-anya-e0802n3:225_0: The group of nine is finished.
